description: Request for Proposal-RFP-2022-8053824 Request for Proposal- RFP-2022-8053824 This Request for Proposal (RFP), Solicitation 2022-8053824, issued on September 26, 2022, seeks public submissions of the Request. Inquire at http://www.tc.gc.ca/eng/initiatives-research
duration_in_months: If the contract is awarded, the start date is expected to be in October 2022.  At the earliest, this project should last for at least 1 year, and at most, indefinitely.
